Plugin_is_not_enabled: Plugin is not enabled, unloading plugin
upload_file_failed: Failed to upload backup to {backup_name}, reason: {error}
upload_skip_duplicate: Skipped uploading backup to {backup_name}, reason: duplicate file
another_uploader_is_running: Another upload process is running, please wait for it to finish!
another_downloader_is_running: Another download process is running, please wait for it to finish!
upload_complete: Backup upload complete. Total: {total_count}, Success: {success_count}, Failed: {failure_count}, Skipped: {skipped_count}
download_skip_duplicate: Skipped downloading backup {filename}, reason: duplicate file
no_available_backup_path: Backup download failed: no available backup path
delete_start: Starting to delete backup {id} located at {backup_path}
delete_file_unfound: Failed to delete backup {filename} located at {backup_path}, reason: file does not exist
delete_failed: Failed to delete backup {filename} located at {backup_path}, reason: {error}
schedule_fail_stopped: Scheduling {task} failed too many times, disabling this scheduled task
export_success: Backup {id} exported successfully, file: {path}, took {time} seconds
change_language_failed: Failed to switch to language {language}! Reason: unsupported language!
ftp_connection_error: Failed to connect to FTP server {backup_name}, reason: {error}
folder_switch_or_generate_failed: Failed to switch or create directory: {error}
list_failed: Failed to fetch file list from {address}, reason: {error}
